marklogic.body:
Thermally conductive materials would HELP with Overheating. We use thermally conductive materials such as Copper and Aluminium to make Heat sinks for chips. Conductive materials quickly spread the Heat out over a greater space, essentially wicking away the Heat. Although bamboo isn't nearly as effective as Aluminum.
The concentrated hot Spot would be cooler, even though the overall temperature may be higher.
The real problem with the new IPad is another antenna gate. They have very poor connectivity and throughput, compared to other cellular wirelss devices at the same location.
